project.name: DSafe
project.shortDescription: Smart Contract monitoring, governance and security will be become very important next decade. DSafe is a SaaS providing tools to solve this problem.
project.needSummary: Looking for a co-founder who can lead sales customer research. Also need UX design support and someone with strong DevOps experience.
project.elevatorPitch: Smart Contract monitoring, governance and security will be become very important next decade. DSafe is a SaaS providing tools to solve this problem.
project.problem: There is currently no good way of keeping track of your smart contracts.
project.mission: DSafe's mission is to revolutionize the world by enabling blockchain technology for everyone.
project.vision: DSafe will be the number one address for smart contract security and governance for serious developers.

timeGoals.oneYear: Target for 1 Jan 2022 is to have at least one signed customer
timeGoals.threeYears: Target for 1 Jan 2024 is to be in the process of raising a Series B round of investment

description.excerpt: As of now only a tiny percentage of companies make use of blockchain technology. Part of the problem is that the ecosystem is not prime time ready - tools commonly available in regular software development (or currently being developed for the AI/ML space) is completely are no where to be found in the blockchain space.

cofounderGoals.reason: Currently there is only minimal funding available and a lot to do. So equity based compensations are to be expected.

availableRoles.title: Sales & Business Development
availableRoles.description: Own the CRs by talking to companies, cold calling companies, getting introductions and discovering the needs and wishes of customers.

availableRoles.title: DevOps
availableRoles.description: Own the stack that we create to show the demos, and run our system on.

availableRoles.title: Design
availableRoles.description: Someone who can own the looks of the project to create a professional appearance.

compensationOfferings.title: Custom
compensationOfferings.description: Compensation amounts and options will be based on the qualifications of individual and the service he or she is providing

users.title: Founder
users.bio: PhD Mathematics, I have worked in multiple startups in the crypto space and have ample experience founding projects and raising money.
users.projectLove: Honestly, this is just really fun to build. My hope is that we get to keep building more useful crypto tools.
